trans-unit.source: Controls access to stores containing X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 控制对包含 X.509 证书的存储区的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission> controls the access that code is granted to X.509 stores.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission> 控件的访问权限的代码被授予到 X.509 存储。

trans-unit.source: The permission is based on flags representing the access levels that apply to every store.
trans-unit.target: 权限取决于表示将应用到每个存储的访问级别的标志。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission" /> class with either fully restricted or unrestricted permission state.
trans-unit.target: 用完全受限制或无限制的权限状态初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The permission object provides either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to X.509 stores.
trans-unit.target: 权限对象提供完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`对 X.509 存储区的访问。

trans-unit.source: If fully restricted (`None`), the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Flags%2A> property can then be set to specify the type of access allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果完全受限制 (`None`)，则<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Flags%2A>然后可以将属性设置为指定的允许访问的类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="state" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission" /> class with the specified access.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的访问权限初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The `flag` parameter specifies the permitted access to X.509 stores.
trans-unit.target: `flag`参数指定对 X.509 存储区的允许访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The specified permitted access applies to all stores.
trans-unit.target: 指定的允许访问情况适用于所有存储区。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to specify access to an individual store.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定对各个商店的访问。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="flag" /> is not a valid combination of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="flag" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags" /> 值的有效组合。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 当前权限的副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: 与原始权限情况下，一份权限表示对资源的相同的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> access allowed by the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前权限允许的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> 访问类型。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Flags%2A> property specifies the permitted access to X.509 stores.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Flags%2A>属性指定对 X.509 存储区的允许访问权限。

trans-unit.source: X.509 stores are physical stores used to persist and manage X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: X.509 存储是用于持久保存和管理 X.509 证书的物理存储。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property to an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将此属性设置为无效值。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags" /> for the valid values.
trans-unit.target: 要查阅有效值，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags" />。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 从 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.FromXml%2A> method reconstructs a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission> object from an XML encoding defined by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.FromXml%2A>方法如何重建<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission>中定义的 XML 编码对象<xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>类。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.ToXml%2A> method to XML-encode the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission>, including state information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.ToXml%2A>方法进行 XML 编码<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission>，包括状态信息。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityElement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityElement" /> is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 不是一个有效的权限元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The version number in <paramref name="securityElement" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 中的版本号无效。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations that both permissions describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 以下两个权限的交集是描述的一组共同描述这两个权限的操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> s not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: A permission to test for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限指定一组完全包含在指定权限的操作，当前权限是指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\.
trans-unit.target: 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示访问权限的子集\\。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回`true`，当前的权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前权限是否不受限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 无限制的权限表示对权限所保护的所有资源的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建权限及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> that contains an XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" />，包含权限的 XML 编码（包括任何状态信息）。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.FromXml%2A> method to restore the state information from a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.FromXml%2A>方法来还原状态信息从<xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>。

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 与当前权限合并的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 对的调用结果<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Union%2A>是由当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。
